text.value: Abdominal distension and not passing stools
Crying continuously after all effort failed
Skin rash all over the body
Swelling, redness or pus discharges on the umbilical cord
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Does have any of the following danger signs?
Date cannot be in the future!
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
Refer to health facility
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Has had any health facility PNC visit since delivery?
_Encourage care giver to take baby to the health facility for PNC visit._
Which facility PNC visit are you reporting?
Which PNC home visit are you reporting?
Date cannot be in the future!
Select date when PNC visit was done
Select which dose of DPT-HepB-Hib was given on
Select which dose of Measles was given on
_Please advise the parent to take the child to the health facility!_
Date cannot be in the past!
When is due for the next immunization?
Select which dose of OPV was given on
Select which dose of PCV was given on
Please check the vaccines information in the newborn notebook
Select which dose of Rota was given on
Date cannot be in the future!
Select the vaccines that were given on
Kupweteka kwa m'mimba ndi kukanika kuchita chimbuzi
Kutupa, kufiira kapena kutuluka mafinya pa mchombo
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Kodi ali ndi zina mwa zizindikilo izi?
_Tumizani mwansanga kuchipatala akakhala ndi zizizndikiro zoopsa!_
_Limbikitsani makolo zopita ndi mwana wawo ku sikelo._
Kodi ulendo wa kuchipatala uwu ndi wa liti?
Kodi kuyendera uku ndi kwa tsiku liti?
Sankhani tsiku lomwe anapita ku chipatala
Sankhani mtundu wa DPT-HepB-Hib omwe analandira patsikuli
Sankhani mtundu wa katemera wa chikuku omwe analandira patsikuli
_Chonde limbikitsani makolo zopita ndi mwana wawo kuchipatala kukalandira katemera!_
Sankhani mtundu wa OPV omwe analandira patsikuli
Sankhani mtundu wa PCV omwe analandira patsikuli
Chonde fufuzani ndondomeko ya katemela mu buku la mwana amene wangobadwa kumene
Kodi analandira katemera wina aliyense kuchokera tsiku lomwe munayendera banjali?
Sankhani mtundu wa Rota omwe analandira patsikulia
